name: podamShouldHandlePojosWithSelfReferenceConstructorsButNotDefaultConstructors

testSteps.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ConstructorWithSelfReferencesButNoDefaultConstructorPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the first self-reference for a POJO without default constructor should not be null
Then the first self-reference for a POJO without default constructor should not be null

title: Podam should handle POJOs with self reference constructors but not default constructors without the need for the @PodamConstructor annotation
